Summary: Hang-Glider Boomerang shaped V craft hovering my head in Duluth Skyline District
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Duluth
There was one other sighting in Duluth on or around August 15th 1970
divs: sighting detailsi was on duluth's skyline and was overlooking the harbor when i heard a slight "swoosh" noise and looked up and saw this v shaped craft slowly going over my head and i watched it for approximately 5 minutes til i saw it going in the general direction of superior, wi. i was on the phone at the time leaving a voice mail on a friend's phone. i saw something in my peripheral vision as i looked over the duluth harbor as i enjoy looking up at the sky from time to time to see the satellites that our circling our skies. at first, when i noticed it i thought it was a new plane of some kind but, i didn't hear any engine noise whatsoever it seemed as if it was floating about 100 feet above me and i saw that it did in fact blocked out the stars as it was passing over my head at a slow rate of about 20 miles an hour from what i could tell. it had a total of 8 lights; 4 on each wing that were yellowish\orangish in color and they were not pulsating but, dimmed in color. i just stood there and watched it til i couldn't see it anymore and then contacted my sister and my mother and told them what i had saw. i felt that was a once in a lifetime experience and my neck hurt because i was looking up in the sky anticipating that it would come back; at least that was my general feeling. my heart was racing and felt like i was planted and couldn't take my eyes off it and it was something that i know was not of this world as i do plenty of research and reading and watching documentaries that this was not something of our military or earthly. i know now that i'm a firm believer and i know what i saw and it's something that i will never forget this night. sincerely, believer
